The Blue Ribbon Project

Talk is cheap. The Blue Ribbon Project is dedicated to analysing cheap talk about our cities: to deconstructing aims articulated by institutions, gauging their feasibility, and describing what steps, in practice, need to be taken for them to be actualised, for them to receive an elusive blue ribbon.

Workshops

The Blue Ribbon Project boils down to a series of workshops.

support

If you are interested in supporting this initiative, get in touch. Also feel free to join A Real Space Community for further updates on ways to support this initiative.
